TopicTitle: A searchbar needs to be added

Articles.Content: I have an idea of something that needs to be added into the game, but nobody has suggested it. when you load saved crafts (like in the SPH or VAB) some people (like me, or vaos3712) have A LOT of saved craft files. so I think that you should ad a search bar to the load craft menu to make it easier to load crafts. what do you think about that everybody? Squad?
Yes, this would be helpful. Or maybe just a feature so that when you push a key on the launch pad dialog, it takes you to that letter (in the alphabetical order)?

Oh, searchbar. Heh, lol. I was just thinking, "what in the name is a seachbar.... is it seechbar? or....". Anyway, I think this is a great idea. It would definitely cut down the time spent scrolling, and scrolling, and scrolling, and scrolling. Then realising you've gone past the craft you wanted, than scrolling, and scrolling, and scrolling, and scrolling. You get the idea. Happens to me all the time. I would love to see this implemented.

Having recently switched from Mac to Windows, I have to say that KSP was so much easier to use on my Macbook. Obviously, it is partly just due to the adjustment of controls/keyboard, but two-finger scroll in VAB was much easier than pg up/dn and shift + 2 finger scroll was much easier than +/-, both in VAB and in flight.

Playing KSP on my Mac was a bit like watching a slide show for larger crafts, though. So it's not all bad.
